question.title: Java Facelets Template Client not implementing the Facelets Template Top Component
question.body:
Hi I am new to Java Web or Java EE and I am trying to implement Facelets Template & Client into my Web Application. I have read many discussion threads about JSP, JSF and Facelets but unable to find any thread similar to what I am facing right now.

I created a Maven Web Application Project using

  • Netbeans 22
  • Tomcat 11.0.
  • JDK 22

Created a Facelets Template named “BasicTemplate.xhtml” and placed it under WEB-INF/templates folder. At the same time created a Facelets Template Client named "Index.xhtml"

BasicTemplate.xhtml

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' ?> 
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
      xmlns:ui="jakarta.faces.facelets"
      xmlns:h="jakarta.faces.html">

    <h:head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
        <h:outputStylesheet name="./css/default.css"/>
        <h:outputStylesheet name="./css/cssLayout.css"/>
        <title>Facelets Template</title>
    </h:head>
    <h:body>
        <div id="top" class="top">
            <ui:insert name="top"><h1>Top Content Of the Page</h1></ui:insert>
        </div>
        <div id="content" class="center_content">
            <ui:insert name="content">Content</ui:insert>
        </div>
    </h:body>
</html>

BasicTemplateImage

Index.xhtml

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' ?>
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">

<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
      xmlns:ui="jakarta.faces.facelets">

    <body>

        <ui:composition template="./WEB-INF/templates/BasicTemplate.xhtml">

            <ui:define name="content">
                content in Index HTML
            </ui:define>

        </ui:composition>

    </body>
</html>

Index.xhtml Image

I am expecting the page to look something like this.

Client With Template Top Component

Where the Index.xhtml implements the “top” part of the “BasicTemplate.xhtml”

I am lost to what is the mistake I am doing right here and would appreciate if somebody could help me out. Thanks.
